item.title: MyFirstBlog
item.description: hugo new site myblog hugo new post/blog.md hugo server -t pure hugo –theme=pure –baseUrl="https://brightsails.github.io” -buildDrafts cd public/ git init git add . git commit -m “第er次commit” git config –global user.name"brightsails” git config –global user.email"2630594775@qq.com” git remote add origin https://github.com/BrightSails/brightsails.github.io.git git push https://github.com/BrightSails/brightsails.github.io.git master git push -u origin
